catList: In the recent years, various advanced communication and computational paradigms have been emerged such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G and beyond, Body Area Networks (BANs), RFID systems, Autonomous Driving, Cyber Physical Systems, etc. Application areas of these paradigms are mostly in personal domains. This causes security and privacy issues of these systems becoming more and more important. In this course, recent advances in the security and privacy of these application domains will be covered.
